mapper.update: update t_theme_month set theme_title=#{themeTitle}, theme_logo=#{themeLogo}, theme_pic=#{themePic}, bottom_pic=#{bottomPic}, update_time=now(), color=#{color}, months=#{months} where theme_id =#{themeId}
mapper.insert: insert t_theme_month ( theme_title, theme_logo, theme_pic, bottom_pic, create_time, update_time, color, months ) values( #{themeTitle}, #{themeLogo}, #{themePic}, #{bottomPic}, now(), now(), #{color}, #{months} )
mapper.select: select * from t_theme_month where 1=1 and theme_id=#{themeId}

select t.theme_id, t.theme_title, t.theme_logo, t.theme_pic, t.bottom_pic, date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time, date_format(t.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as update_time, t.color, t.months from t_theme_month t where 1 = 1 order by create_time desc
